description.ruby-sapphire:
The higher the user’s HP,
the more damage caused.
description.emerald:
The higher the user’s HP,
the more damage caused.
description.firered-leafgreen:
The higher the
user’s HP, the more
powerful this
attack becomes.
description.diamond-pearl:
The user attacks in
an explosive fury.
The lower the user’s
HP, the less powerful
this attack becomes.
description.platinum:
The user attacks in
an explosive fury.
The lower the user’s
HP, the less powerful
this attack becomes.
description.heartgold-soulsilver:
The user attacks in
an explosive fury.
The lower the user’s
HP, the less powerful
this attack becomes.
description.black-white:
The user attacks the opposing team with
explosive fury. The lower the user’s HP,
the less powerful this attack becomes.
description.black-2-white-2:
The user attacks the opposing team with
explosive fury. The lower the user’s HP,
the less powerful this attack becomes.
description.x-y:
The user attacks opposing Pokémon with
explosive fury. The lower the user’s HP,
the lower the move’s power.

The user attacks opposing Pokémon with
explosive fury. The lower the user’s HP,
the lower the move’s power.

description.sword-shield:
The user attacks opposing Pokémon with explosive
fury. The lower the user’s HP, the lower the

effect.full: Inflicts regular damage.  Power increases with the user's remaining HP and is given by `150 * HP / max HP`, to a maximum of 150 when the user has full HP.
effect.shortEffect: Inflicts more damage when the user has more HP remaining, with a maximum of 150 power.
